item.title: What's the difference between a proxy and reverse proxy server?
item.description: Proxy server In a proxy server, the servers do not know which client is making the request. A VPN server is a type of proxy server which allows a client to hide their actual IP address from the servers. Reverse proxy server In a reverse proxy server, the clients do not know which server is responding to the request. A load balancer is a type of reverse proxy server that distributes its traffic to available servers to process requests.
